titles.title: Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act of 2012
To amend chapter 1 of title 9 of United States Code with respect to arbitration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 8/2/2012--Introduced. Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act of 2012 - Provides that a pre-dispute arbitration agreement between a long-term care facility and a resident (or anyone acting on the resident's behalf) shall not be valid or specifically enforceable.
